item.content:encoded:
Sense 2022 . Inverness

The six around the table seemed downcast. “None of these advertising proposals work,” I repeated. “They don’t communicate our company’s new purpose.” I looked around and asked, “Which is$4”
“Helping women be healthy, happy, and at home in their bodies,” said Elizabeth, the youngest team member. She looked thoughtful.
“Exactly!” I said. “Yes, Amatheen sells athletic apparel, but our customers don’t care about fabric technology. They want to know how Amatheen is improving women’s lives and benefiting society. They’re our partners in that endeavor, not just consumers. That’s what we have to communicate.”

Elizabeth’s face lit up. I couldn’t wait to see the team’s next pitch.



Analyze


A recent poll by Deloitte showed the three top issues consumers identify with while making decisions about a brand are how the company treats its own people, how it treats the environment, and how it supports the community in which it operates. More than 80 percent say they are willing to pay more if a brand raises its prices to be more environmentally or socially responsible or to pay higher wages.


“Most customers are lured into relationships

with retailers not because of ads but because of trust.”


Deloitte’s research also shows that purpose-oriented companies report 30 percent higher levels of innovation and 40 percent higher levels of workforce retention than competitors. Authenticity is paramount, however, because customers, workers, and partners may be wary of a business’s motives in adopting this approach.


Act


Be authentic and walk the walk. Authenticity is rooted in a brand’s commitment to creating an impact and sharing its story. Be transparent and accountable for everything you do.


Put all humans at the heart of your decisions. Acknowledging the importance of diversity and inclusion fosters the authenticity of a brand. Use data and insights to understand what your customers value and connect it to your purpose.


Let purpose evolve with the organization. Every business is founded with a core purpose. It needs to evolve inclusively over time, helping to bond people together across the organization.
